mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cloud_caoping(cloud_caoping_id, emp_id, cloud_caoping_title, cloud_caoping_content,cloud_caoping_prices , cloud_caoping_guige_id, cloud_caoping_pic, cloud_caoping_type_id, cloud_caoping_use_id,cloud_caoping_address ,cloud_caoping_dateline , cloud_caoping_is_use, cloud_caoping_is_del, lat,lng ) VALUES (#{cloud_caoping_id}, #{emp_id}, #{cloud_caoping_title}, #{cloud_caoping_content}, #{cloud_caoping_prices}, #{cloud_caoping_guige_id}, #{cloud_caoping_pic}, #{cloud_caoping_type_id}, #{cloud_caoping_use_id}, #{cloud_caoping_address}, #{cloud_caoping_dateline}, #{cloud_caoping_is_use}, #{cloud_caoping_is_del}, #{lat}, #{lng})
mapper.select: SELECT sn.*,le.emp_name as emp_name, le.emp_cover as emp_cover,lgg.cloud_caoping_guige_cont as cloud_caoping_guige_cont ,luse.cloud_caoping_use_cont as cloud_caoping_use_cont,ltype.cloud_caoping_type_cont as cloud_caoping_type_cont from cloud_caoping sn LEFT JOIN lx_emp le ON le.emp_id = sn.emp_id LEFT JOIN cloud_caoping_guige lgg ON lgg.cloud_caoping_guige_id = sn.cloud_caoping_guige_id LEFT JOIN cloud_caoping_use luse ON luse.cloud_caoping_use_id = sn.cloud_caoping_use_id LEFT JOIN cloud_caoping_type ltype ON ltype.cloud_caoping_type_id = sn.cloud_caoping_type_id where sn.cloud_caoping_id=#{cloud_caoping_id}
